patthana7.21:1.1_0: Naajjhattārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naajjhattārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana7.21:1.1_1: Naajjhattārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nabahiddhārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana7.21:2.1_0: Nabahiddhārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nabahiddhārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana7.21:2.1_1: Nabahiddhārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naajjhattārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
